item.title: Accounts In Ethereum Context
item.description: The concept of Blockchain it self is based on change of the state, to be precise “storing of every state change”. We can call this state-changing “action” a “transaction”. To do these transactions there has to be some entities which can be recognized by the blockchain in our case Ethereum. Let’s call these entities “Accounts”. The Ethereum blockchain recognize these “entities that are capable of doing transactions”(We just named them as Accounts) with their Address.
